titleInfo.title: American Dance Festival at the DPAC

mods.abstract: Three color window card (navy and pink on yellow) announcing the American Dance Festival at the Durham Performing Arts Center beginning June to July. Poster features a woodcut of a dancer. Event features Kidd Pivot and Electric Company Theatre, Bill T. Jones/ Arine Zane Company, Mark Morris Dance Group, Carolina Ballet, African American Dance Ensemble, Pilobolus, Paul Taylor Dance Company, Joyemovement, Charlotte Ballet, and Elizabeth Burke and Luke Hickey.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
